attributes.action: With the current oil prices so high i don't ask much simply stop increasing tax on petrol. The price of a litre of petrol to be garaunteed to remain under £1 by the government which is a huge phsycological barrier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask the government to stop so unashamedly increasing tax on fuel on top of the record prices of oil which have made the prices soar. The amount of tax paid on fuels is an outrage. If it was not increased again for the next 100 years it would still remain disproportionately high. Get it down MR BROWN.
